title: Tata Motors looks to spin off its NBFC arms, merge with IPO-bound Tata Capital
description: Group holding company Tata Sons will offer shares of Tata Capital to Tata Motors. This will give India's third-largest carmaker by volume a minority stake in Tata Capital.
